CmdInsertTracker Class Reference

Detailed Description

CmdInsertTracker class is the insert command for trackers stored in the command stack.

CmdInsertTracker represents a single shape insertion action on a scene, insert a new trackers node to the scene.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

CmdInsertTracker::CmdInsertTracker ( TTracker *  tracker,
const QModelIndex &  parentIndex,
SoSceneKit *  scene,
SceneModel *  model,
QUndoCommand *  parent = 0 
)

Creates a new tracker insert command that adds a tracker to a parent node with parentIndex in the model.

If parent is not null, this command is appended to parent's child list and then owns this command.

CmdInsertTracker::~CmdInsertTracker (  )

Destroys the CmdInsertTracker object.

Member Function Documentation

void CmdInsertTracker::redo (  ) [virtual]

Inserts the tracker in the scene model as a parentIndex child.

void CmdInsertTracker::undo (  ) [virtual]

Reverts model state. After undo() is called, the parentIndex node will not contain a tracker type node.

See also:
redo().
